channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Social Security will soon require in-person identity checks for new and existing recipients
item.description: In an effort to limit fraudulent claims, the Social Security Administration will impose tighter identity-proofing measures — which will require millions of recipients and applicants to visit agency field offices rather than interact with the agency over the phone.

item.title: JFK assassination files released, sending history buffs hunting for new clues
Fishermen say Trump’s DOGE budget cuts are preventing them from adopting climate-friendly technology
